item.description:
Incredible opportunity to participate in an interactive workshop with Conscious Birth Pioneer Elena Tonetti-Vladimirova!

If you are hearing the calling for personal & planetary transformation this workshop is for you! A new paradigm is being imprinted in the cellular structure of our beings and affects all of our relationships - with ourselves and others... move through any and all limiting imprinted patterns & behaviors and integrate new ways of being.

Join us for this 2 Day workshop. For anyone has ever been born or is planning to make people some day, this is a truly profound experience! Our birth experience is dictating our ability to live our fullest potential (or not). If you are interested in creating a set point to open to greater joy, passion, and expression in life, come join us. Welcome your own re-birth!

View the 'Birth into Being' workshop schedule at:
http://www.birthintobeing.com/calendar.html

View the 10-minute trailer of the award-winning documentary:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZtYCHASqNM
Film Screenings Wed June 15th (Hartford) &  Fri June 17th (Stamford)

 

Investment: $400 ~ To register, contact Muneeza @ 203.550.6791

Discounted price of $300 each if you register with a partner or friend.
item.why: planetary healing occurs when we heal ourselves
item.name: Attend Elena Tonetti's Limbic Recoding Workshop Day 1
